A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok. First of all\, I wish that people would stop framing Rian Johnson’s work on this film as “bold choices”. That’s like peeing on us and telling us that it’s only rain. The harsh truth is that it is a bad movie. There’s really no other way to say it. How do I know this? Because half the fans hate it. Because it totally disrespected what came before it. Because\, for the first time in my life\, I left a Star Wars product (film\, tv show\, or book) with a bad (negative) feeling about it. Having said that\, I look forward to JJ Abrams return to the helm for episode IX. JJ understands and respects the Star Wars legacy. Help us JJ. You are our only hope.
